title: The Waterloo Medallion: The Prince Regent (later George IV) of England, Francis II of Austria, Alexander I of Russia, and Frederick Wilhelm III of Prussia Surrounded by Symbols of Power and Justice, with Day, Night, the Fates, and the Furies [obverse]
dimensions:
overall (diameter): 13.87 cm (5 7/16 in.)
gross weight: 506.5 gr (1.117 lb.)
axis: 12:00
creditline: Gift of Lisa and Leonard Baskin
